snippet.title: Guacamelee! 2 - Release Date Announcement (PS4 & Steam)
snippet.description:
Guacamelee! 2 is OUT NOW on PS4/PC/Steam! 

Seven years after defeating Carlos Calaca, Juan Aguacate is forced to don his luchador mask again to face a new threat - this time to the very fabric of space and time. Punch your way through a whole new Metroid-vania style world and try to save the Mexiverse!

Find more information on the game here: http://www.guacamelee2.com

For the latest developments, follow us on Social Media: https://twitter.com/DrinkBoxStudios/
https://www.facebook.com/DrinkBoxStudios/
